descr.wire.field.name: Field Name
descr.wire.description: Description of the field. (Repeated for each field)
descr.wire.field.name: Wire
descr.wire.description: Contains the sequential number of the wire, e.g. in the harness.
descr.wire.field.name: Harness ident
descr.wire.description: Harness ident identifies pre-assembled wires, which are installed on the bicycle.
descr.wire.field.name: Wire sequential number
descr.wire.description: Contains the sequential number of the wire, e.g. in the harness.
descr.wire.field.name: Wire information circuit code
descr.wire.description: Contains the identifier of the circuit to which the wire belongs.
descr.wire.field.name: Wire information wire section identification
descr.wire.description: Contains the identifier of the section to which the wire belongs.
descr.wire.field.name: Length
descr.wire.description: Length identifies the length of the wire. The given value is approximately 10% higher than necessary to install the wire on the bicycle.
descr.wire.field.name: Color
descr.wire.description: Color identifies the color of the wire sheating.
descr.wire.field.name: Twisting
descr.wire.description: Twistig identifies wires, which are twisted together with a unique identifier.
descr.wire.field.name: Electric ident
descr.wire.description: Electric ident shows the electrical identification, to which the wire is connected. It is available for all electrical equipment, eg L1.
descr.wire.field.name: Contact
descr.wire.description: Contact identifies the electrical contact to which the wire is connected.
descr.wire.field.name: Group code
descr.wire.description: Identifies wires, which are connected to the same terminal lug.
descr.wire.field.name: Screens
descr.wire.description: Screens identifies all screens that shield the wire. Wires shielded by the same screen are identified by the same screens value.
descr.wire.field.name: Responsible partner company
descr.wire.description: The responsible partner company indicates the company responsible for the integration of the wire to the bicycle.
descr.wire.field.name: Feed-through
descr.wire.description: Identifies bunges through which the wire is routed.
descr.wire.field.name: Next higher assembly
descr.wire.description: Identifies the next higher assenbly, in which the wire is installed.

descr.harness.field.name: Field Name
descr.harness.description: Description of the field. (Repeated for each field)
descr.harness.field.name: Harness ident
descr.harness.description: Harness ident identifies pre-assembled wires, which are installed on the bicycle.
descr.harness.field.name: Harness Part number
descr.harness.description: Harness part number gives the part number of the harness identified by the harness ident.
descr.harness.field.name: Harness variant
descr.harness.description: Harness variant identifies the variant of the harness in addition to the harness part number.
descr.harness.field.name: Harness issue
descr.harness.description: Harness issue identifies the production variant of the harness in addition to the harness part number.
descr.harness.field.name: Harness nomenclature
descr.harness.description: Harness nomenclature identifies the harness by using a specific name.
descr.harness.field.name: Harness separation code
descr.harness.description: Harness separation code gives the separation code of the harness.
descr.harness.field.name: Minimum temperature
descr.harness.description: Minimum temperature gives the minimum environment temperature in which the harness can be used.
descr.harness.field.name: Maximum temperature
descr.harness.description: Maximum temperature gives the maximum environment temperature in which the harness can be used.
descr.harness.field.name: Harness environment
descr.harness.description: Harness environment indicates that a harness is used in high vibriation or/and hydraulic areas.
descr.harness.field.name: Sleeve
descr.harness.description: Gives the part number and/or the material of the sleeves used on the harness.
descr.harness.field.name: Responsible partner company
descr.harness.description: The responsible partner company indicates the company responsible for the integration of the harness to the bicycle.

descr.electrical.equip.field.name: Field Name
descr.electrical.equip.description: Description of the field. (Repeated for each field)
descr.electrical.equip.field.name: Electric ident
descr.electrical.equip.description: Electric ident shows the electrical identification, which is available for all electrical equipment, eg L1.
descr.electrical.equip.field.name: Part identification
descr.electrical.equip.description: Part identification shows the part number of the equipment. In most cases the part number is identical to the part desciption.
descr.electrical.equip.field.name: Location
descr.electrical.equip.description: Location shows the installation position of the equipment on the bicycle.
descr.electrical.equip.field.name: Next higher assenmbly
descr.electrical.equip.description: Next higher assenmbly identifies the box or panel, in which the equipment is installed.
descr.electrical.equip.field.name: Position on next higher assenmbly
descr.electrical.equip.description: Gives the position on next higher assenmbly.
descr.electrical.equip.field.name: Group code
descr.electrical.equip.description: Identifies wires, which are connected to the same terminal lug.
descr.electrical.equip.field.name: Group code
descr.electrical.equip.description: Gives the position on next higher assenmbly.
descr.electrical.equip.field.name: Group code
descr.electrical.equip.description: Gives the position on next higher assenmbly.
descr.electrical.equip.field.name: Group code
descr.electrical.equip.description: Gives the position on next higher assenmbly.
